missions.name: Help an NPC
missions.description: Assist a non-player character with their task.

missions.name: Win a game of chance
missions.description: Participate in a gambling game and win.

missions.name: Deliver a package
missions.description: Deliver a package to a specified location.

missions.name: Find a lost item
missions.description: Search for and return a lost item to its owner.

missions.name: Complete a daily task
missions.description: Finish a daily task assigned to you.

missions.name: Participate in a community event
missions.description: Join a community event and contribute.

missions.name: Trade with another player
missions.description: Engage in a trade with another player.

missions.name: Explora una nueva area
missions.description: Visit and explore a new area in the game.
